textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Julesarnia on twitter Vibeke Dahl on Twitter is.. https://twitter.com/DahlPhotography It then occurred to me. these guys were generally shown as doing something wrong, which of course they were not. OK, take track to today. London is experiencing riots. Thousands if not millions of stills and videos are being shot of rioters, looters and robbers. The police are asking for these shots and videos to help them arrest law breakers. Where does this leave their -- hide signature --
